item.description: A quote from “Adults in the Room” by Yanis Varoufakis That which feels to many like a conspiracy of the powerful is simply the emergent property of any network of super black boxes. Adults in the Room What happens when you take on the establishment? In this blistering, personal account, world-famous economist Yanis Varoufakis blows the ... Source: - https://www.goodreads.com
